title: CNN Restricts Access to Facebook Pages in Australia
sub_head: Company said it wants to avoid liability for user comments following Australian court ruling
body:
CNN said it has restricted access to its Facebook Inc. pages in Australia following a ruling from that countryâ€™s high court that makes news organizations legally liable for comments on their Facebook posts.
Facebook users in Australia will no longer have access to major pages run by the network, including its primary Facebook page, its CNN International page and pages dedicated to its shows, a CNN spokeswoman said.
